titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Michigan farmer.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

descgrp.altformavail: Available on microfilm from Xerox University Microfilms (American periodical series: 1800-1850).

odd.head: Issuing Body
odd.p: Imprint varies: published later in Detroit, by Warren Isham.

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: "Devoted to agriculture, horticulture, and domestic and rural affairs."

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: Description based on: Jan. 1, 1848; title from caption.
